metadata.name: The OB's Oceanside Shindig Commemorative
metadata.description:
The Oceanside Shindig with Bill Murray on January 28, 2023, was an incredible day for the Bill Murray 1000 community. In appreciation of everyone who showed up and showed out at our inaugural event, we are dropping a commemorative NFT to all of the attendees. 

This NFT is based on the large sign that was autographed by Bill and everyone who attended as they were checking in and getting their badges. None of us knew as we were checking in, what the next few hours would bring, but we knew we were in the right place, at the right time, with the right people, to make some magical memories. And we did!

“So this is my first real NFT experience here. And everybody's very similar to Deadheads or Comic-Con people in that they have a sweetness about them…” 
- Bill Murray

Whenever you see this NFT in your wallet, we hope you remember what an amazing day that was, and how special it is to be a part of the Bill Murray 1000 community.
